languages.text: "Вы очень, просто поразительно прямолинейны в словах, сестра".
"You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."
languages.original_text: "Вы очень, просто поразительно прямолинейны в словах, сестра".

traits.locale_text: "You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."

languages.text: « Vous ne mâchez pas vos mots, ma sœur. »
languages.original_text: "You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne mâchez pas vos mots, ma sœur. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Se expresa de forma notablemente directa, hermana».
languages.original_text: "You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."

traits.locale_text: «Se expresa de forma notablemente directa, hermana».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「本当にずけずけと物を言うのだな、シスターよ」
languages.original_text: "You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."

traits.locale_text: 「本当にずけずけと物を言うのだな、シスターよ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr seid erstaunlich direkt in Euren Meinungsäußerungen, Schwester."
languages.original_text: "You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid erstaunlich direkt in Euren Meinungsäußerungen, Schwester."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."

languages.text: "Düşüncelerini ifade ederken açık sözlülükten geri durmuyorsun Rahibe."
languages.original_text: "You are remarkably direct in the way you express yourself, Sister."
